s0520.chinese: 武王謂甘茂曰：「寡人欲容車通三川，窺周室，死不恨矣。」
s0520.literal: Duke Wu said to Gan Mao: 'I wish to have chariots pass through the three river valleys, gaze upon the Zhou house, then die without regret.'
s0520.idiomatic: Duke Wu said to Gan Mao: 'I wish to have chariots pass through the three river valleys, gaze upon the Zhou house, then die without regret.'

s0521.chinese: 其秋，使甘茂、庶長封伐宜陽。
s0521.literal: That autumn, sent Gan Mao and Senior Minister Feng to attack Yiyang.
s0521.idiomatic: That autumn, sent Gan Mao and Senior Minister Feng to attack Yiyang.

s0523.literal: Crossed the Yellow River, fortified Wusui.
s0523.idiomatic: Crossed the Yellow River, fortified Wusui.

s0524.literal: Wei crown prince came to court.
s0524.idiomatic: Wei crown prince came to court.

s0525.chinese: 武王有力好戲，力士任鄙、烏獲、孟說皆至大官。
s0525.literal: Duke Wu was strong and fond of games, strongmen Ren Bi, Wu Huo, Meng Yue all reached high office.
s0525.idiomatic: Duke Wu was strong and fond of games, strongmen Ren Bi, Wu Huo, Meng Yue all reached high office.

s0526.literal: The king competed with Meng Yue in lifting the ding tripod, ruptured his kneecap.
s0526.idiomatic: The king competed with Meng Yue in lifting the ding tripod, ruptured his kneecap.

s0528.literal: Executed Meng Yue and his entire clan.
s0528.idiomatic: Executed Meng Yue and his entire clan.

s0529.literal: Duke Wu took a Wei woman as queen, had no sons.
s0529.idiomatic: Duke Wu took a Wei woman as queen, had no sons.

s0530.literal: Established different mother younger brother, this was Duke Zhaoxiang.
s0530.idiomatic: Established different mother younger brother, this was Duke Zhaoxiang.

s0531.chinese: 昭襄母楚人，姓羋氏，號宣太后。
s0531.literal: Duke Zhaoxiang's mother was Chu person, surname Mi, titled Xuan Dowager.
s0531.idiomatic: Duke Zhaoxiang's mother was Chu person, surname Mi, titled Xuan Dowager.

s0532.chinese: 武王死時，昭襄王為質於燕，燕人送歸，得立。
s0532.literal: When Duke Wu died, Duke Zhaoxiang was hostage in Yan, Yan people sent him back, thus was established.
s0532.idiomatic: When Duke Wu died, Duke Zhaoxiang was hostage in Yan, Yan people sent him back, thus was established.

s0533.chinese: 昭襄王元年，嚴君疾為相。
s0533.literal: Duke Zhaoxiang first year, Yan Jun Ji became chancellor.
s0533.idiomatic: Duke Zhaoxiang first year, Yan Jun Ji became chancellor.

s0534.literal: Gan Mao went out to Wei.
s0534.idiomatic: Gan Mao went out to Wei.

s0536.chinese: 庶長壯與大臣、諸侯、公子為逆，皆誅，及惠文后皆不得良死。
s0536.literal: Senior Minister Zhuang with ministers, lords, princes rebelled, all executed, and Duke Huiwen's queen all did not die good deaths.
s0536.idiomatic: Senior Minister Zhuang with ministers, lords, princes rebelled, all executed, and Duke Huiwen's queen all did not die good deaths.

s0537.literal: Dao Duke Wu's queen went out and returned to Wei.
s0537.idiomatic: Dao Duke Wu's queen went out and returned to Wei.

s0539.chinese: 與楚王會黃棘，與楚上庸。
s0539.literal: Met with Chu king at Huang Ji, ceded Shangyong to Chu.
s0539.idiomatic: Met with Chu king at Huang Ji, ceded Shangyong to Chu.
